amendment.description: To provide for a deficit-neutral reserve fund that preserves and promotes Medicare payment policies that support rural health care providers.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4248 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4248 proposed by Senator Conrad for Senator Barrasso. (consideration: CR S2064-2067; text: CR S2065) To provide for a deficit-neutral reserve fund that preserves and promotes Medicare payment policies that support rural health care providers.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4248 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4248 proposed by Senator Conrad for Senator Barrasso.
